tessie - TL: jp
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: en

tessie - TL: ……漫画かアニメに登場したものだと思います。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...has been in something like an anime or a manga before.

tessie - TL: 何？　も、もう一度頼む……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Huh? C-Can you repeat that once more...?

tessie - TL: 多分。この魔法陣は、漫画かアニメに登場したものだと思います。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I think... that this magic circle appeared in some manga or anime before, probably.
What'd you say?! Manga...?!?!

tessie - TL: ベアトは見てないんですかー？　……名探偵ワニャン。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Beatrice, haven't you seen it...? Detective Wanyan.

tessie - TL: え？！　わっはははは、妾はカネダ少年の事件簿派でなぁ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Huh?! Ahahahaha, I'm more Team Kaneda Case Files, remember?

tessie - TL:
ワニャンは子供っぽいから見ておらぬのだ。そういえば、紗音は面
白いと言っていて勧めてきたことがあったなぁ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Detective Wanyan is too childish, so I don't watch it. That said, I remember Shannon saying it was interesting and recommending it to me.

tessie - TL: ……マジで本当に面白いから見て下さいぃって。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...It seriously is {i}incredibly{/i} interesting, so do please watch it.
Lloro - QC/TL: really -> seriously is incredibly (can be more verbose probs)

tessie - TL: 我が主も、私がこんなにも勧めているのに、ちーーーーっとも見てくれないんですよ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Even though I had recommended it so much to my master as well, she didn't even so much as glaaaaaanceee...
Lloro - QC/TL: from "Even my master... even though I recommended it so much, didn't watch even a liiiitle bit....

tessie - TL:
何も知らない人が見たら、とてもグロテスクな魔法陣に見えるで
しょうね。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: For people who don't know much about it... it'll look like a really grotesque magic circle.
Lloro - QC/TL: added much about

tessie - TL:
でも、……知っている人には、むしろ微笑ましく思えるかもしれな
い。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But... for people who know, it might actually make them smile.
Lloro - QC/TL: even -> actually

tessie - TL:
この魔法陣が……、名探偵ワニャンの中に登場するから、……デス
カ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Did this magic circle... appear in Detective WANYAN...?

tessie - TL:
まだ見てない人は見て下さいよぉ。大人気で上映期間も延長中なん
ですよぉ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: If you haven't watched it yet, please do sooo... It's really popular and the screening period has extendeddd...

tessie - TL:
……劇場版アニメ、名探偵ワニャン『中秋哀歌～兎たちの悲恋殺人
事件～』……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...The movie, Detective Wanyan's "Mid-Autumn's Lament: The Heartbroken Rabbits Murder Case"...
Lloro - QC/TL: gotta find what reference it probably is first
Naegles - QC2: fixed it ;;;)))

tessie - TL:
この中に出てくる連続殺人犯が、現場に残す魔法陣なんです
よぉぉ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The serial killer in this movie leaves magic circles on the crime sceneeeee...

tessie - TL: ……その連続殺人犯は、……人気あるの？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...Is that serial killer...... popular?

tessie - TL:
ありますよぉおおおおぉおぉお！！　巷じゃ、無頼人（ブライト）
さまは、１００億の男なんて言われてるんですよぉおぉ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Um, YEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSS?! They're saying {note_green}Bright-sama{/note_green} has like 10 billion men after him in real liiiiifeeeeeee!!!!

tessie - TL:
すっごい儚くて美しくて、死でしか結ばれえない悲しき愛の貫き
方……！！　あぁあぁ、無頼人さまぁあぁぁ……！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: It's just so mysterious, just so beautiful the way that he pierces through the melancholy of love by eternally tying someone to him through death...!! Aaaahhhhhnn, Bright-samaaaaaaaa...!!

tessie - TL:
つ、……つまり。映画に登場する、イケメン犯人が現場に残すサイ
ン、という訳なのか……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: S-... So, this means in the movie, a handsome killer leaves a "sign" at the crime scene...?

tessie - TL:
魔女から見て、魔法陣がおかしいのはご愛敬ですよぉお！！　作者
の代官山剛先生はミステリーの専門家で、魔法陣の専門家じゃない
んですからぁ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Looking at it as a witch and thinking that the magic circles are silly is part of its chaaaaaaarrrmm!!! The author, {note_green}Mr. Go Daikanyama{/note_green}, is an expert on mystery, not on magic circleeeeeess!!

tessie - TL:
それでね？　それでね？！　詩音が持ってきた魔法陣、ちょいちょ
い細かいとこが間違ってんですよぉおぉ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: And you know what else? You know what elsee?! The magic circle that Shion brought has the details all wroooooonggg!!

tessie - TL:
愛が足りない、愛がないから視えてないッ！　とりあえず、１日３
公演で１ヶ月は映画館に通わなきゃあ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: There wasn't enough love, no, there wasn't any love in it at all, so they couldn't see it! In any event, I absolutely HAVE to attend the three-time screening at the theaters a month from nooooowwwww!!

tessie - TL:
私が描いた方は完璧です！　代官山剛先生のチーフアシの人を３日
も監禁して教えてもらったんです！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The way that I drew it was perfect! Even Mr. Go Daikanyama's Chief Ash character was able to learn it himself in just three days while in confinement!!

tessie - TL: さらーりと犯罪をＣＯしてるなぁー。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: No hesitation coming out about doing the crime now, huh?

tessie - TL:
つまり。……名探偵ワニャンの映画を見ていた紗音や魅音詩音
は、……一目見ただけで、この魔法陣の意味が、わかっていたとい
うことデスネ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Essentially... having only seen the Wanyan movie once, Shannon, Mion, and Shion were able to see the meaning behind the circle with EASE...
Lloro - QC/TL: i feel like this script uses "in other words" for tsumari way too much

tessie - TL:
魅音さんたちが、コスプレ撮影をしていることは、紗音さんもご存
知だったはずです。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Shannon-san should have also been aware that Mion-san's group was doing a cosplay photo shoot.

tessie - TL:
そして、窓の鍵を直しに入室したら、……映画と同じ、イケメン犯
人の魔法陣を描いたシーツが。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: And so, as she entered the room to fix the window lock... just as she saw in the movie, the sheets with the handsome criminal's magic circle were sitting there.

tessie - TL:
……はぁぁぁぁぁ……。それは……、怖がるどころか、むしろ同じ
作品のファンとして、微笑ましくなってしまうなぁ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...*siiiigh*... So, in place of being afraid of it, she saw it as a fellow fan of the series and began to smile, huh...

tessie - TL:
ヱリカさんが、意味ありげな笑みを浮かべながら、部屋は荒らされ
てなかったかと聞いてきたなら……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: And Erika-san put a suggestive smile on her face after hearing that the room wasn't broken into...

tessie - TL:
……紗音が涼し気に、いいえ、ご安心を、という気持ちも、少しは
わかるというものデス。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...I understand the sentiment behind why Shannon coolly said, "No, please be at ease.", a little bit more NOW.

tessie - TL:
映画は見ていませんが、恐らく、ベッドの荒れ方も、かなり映画に
準拠していたでしょう。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I haven't watched the movie, but I suppose even the way the bed was laid waste to was likely based on the movie.

tessie - TL:
思えば、ヱリカさんのベッドの毛布や枕の乱れ方は、……まるでお
手本があるかのように、あたしのベッドの時と瓜二つでした。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Now that I think about it, Erika-san's blanket and pillows on her bed were arranged... in a pattern, exactly the same as my bed was back then.

tessie - TL: ……これは、……名探偵ワニャンを読んでみるしかないなぁ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...Guess I'm... gonna have to read Detective Wanyan, huh...

tessie - TL:
あたしも、今回の事件で興味を持ったわ。……本屋で単行本を探し
てみるわ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I also have some interest in this recent case. ...I'll search for the specific volume in the bookstore.

tessie - TL:
そんな訳で、第一の魔法陣事件は、ヱリカさんの手による、えぇ
と……、
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: For that reason, the first magic circle accident was done by none other than Erika-san's hands...... *ahem*...

tessie - TL:
はいはぁい、リザインですよぉおぉぉ……。私が悪かったです
よぉぉ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Yeah, yeah. I resiiiiiignnnnn... It was my faaaaulltttt...

tessie - TL: リザインで、よろしいデスカ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Are you okay with RESIGNING?

tessie - TL:
参りましたぁ、負けましたぁ。大人しくお家に帰って、ワニャンの
単行本、また１巻から全読破しまぁす……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I'm finiiished... defeeeated. I'll behave and go back home to read through the whole Wanyan manga series agaaaiiinnn...

tessie - TL:
妾にも単行本を貸してくれぬか。そなたをそこまで虜にするとは、
実に興味深いぞ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Why not even lend some volumes to me? For you to go that far in punishing yourself is dreadfully fascinating!

tessie - TL:
それでは、ヱリカのリザインにより、勝者はベアトリーチェと菜央
デス。おめでとうございマス。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little:
In that case, through Erika's resign, the winners are Beatrice and NAO. 
I congratulate the both of YOU.
Lloro - QC/TL: i feel like CONGRATULATIONS in all caps right after NAO is too aggressive

tessie - TL:
ドラノールさんが拍手を始めると、あたしとベアトリーチェも
それに倣う。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Dlanor-san started a round of applause, so Beatrice and I joined in.

tessie - TL:
くらげみたいな軟体動物と化してグネグネしているヱリカさん
も、投げ遣りではあるが共に拍手をしてくれた……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: As if she had transformed into a sea mollusc wriggling around its tendrils, Erika-san begrudgingly joined in on the applause for us...

tessie - TL: うむ！！　妾は大満足であるぞッ。実に楽しい誕生日であった！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Yeah!! I'm very satisfied! I truly had a fun birthday!

tessie - TL:
菜央よ、ヱリカよ！！　そなたたちは、見事、妾の退屈の病を癒し
てくれた。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Nao, Erika!! You two have successfully cured me of my boredom.

tessie - TL:
ヱリカには褒美として、そなたが素晴らしい贈り物を届けてくれ
た、素晴らしい使者であったと記したベルンカステル卿宛ての親書
を授けよう。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: As a reward to Erika for sending me this delightful present, allow me to give you this handwritten letter I put together stating what a wonderful messenger you were, addressed to Lady Bernkastel.

tessie - TL:
さらに追伸にて、名探偵ワニャンは面白いらしいぞと、妾からもお
勧めしておく！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: What's more, in the postscript, I recommended Detective Wanyan to her as well, stating how amusing I find it!

tessie - TL:
ベ、ベアトリーチェ卿……！！　有り難きお言葉！　
ははぁぁぁ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: M-Miss Beatrice...!! Thank you for your wordsss!! Ha-, haaaaaahhh!!!!
Lloro - QC/TL: added haaah / split up the ha's here so it didnt sound like a silly triumphant laugh

tessie - TL:
菜央。ヱリカを誤解しないで下サイ。……ヱリカは優れた探偵も、
憐れな犯人も同時に演じられる、素晴らしい俳優なのデス。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Nao, please do not misunderstand ERIKA. ...Erika plays her part both as an outstanding detective and a pitiable criminal, and does a fine job as an ACTRESS.
Lloro - QC/TL: wording mayb

tessie - TL:
……わかってるわ。彼女は普段、悪役を演じているだけで、本当は
そうじゃないってこと。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...I realize that. She's only pretending to be the villain, but normally, she actually isn't like that.

tessie - TL:
…………菜央。やはり貴女は、航海者の魔女に並ぶ、特別な人のよ
うデス。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ......Nao, you really are an extraordinary person, even coming up to par with Voyager WITCHES.
Lloro - QC/TL: This is so cranky I'm sorry
Naegles - QC2: from "Nao, you really are a special person, lining up with voyager WITCHES.

tessie - TL:
そして菜央よ！　そなたも我が六軒島へ来て、よく最後まで妾と
ゲームに付き合ってくれた！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: And Nao! You came to {i}my{/i} Rokkenjima and spent lots of time playing games with me until the very end!
Lloro - QC/TL: she uses both the ikuko and the beatrice I forms here AAAAAA

tessie - TL:
……薔薇を眺めながら、のんびり刺繍をするつもりだったのにね。
サイアクのバカンスになったわ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...My intention was to embroider while relaxing in the rose garden, though. It became the {i}worst{/i} possible vacation ever.

tessie - TL: でも。………あたしも、ちょっと楽しかったかも、かも……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But... I might have also enjoyed it a little bit... maybe.
Lloro - QC/TL: added might have

tessie - TL: もうじき、夜が明ける。それでお別れだ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Dawn will arrive soon. We will part then.
Lloro - QC/TL: from "That will be our parting

tessie - TL:
妾からの、心ばかりのプレゼントを贈っておく。楽しみにして目覚
めるがよい。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I'll present you with a small token of my thanks. Do look forward to it upon waking up.

tessie - TL:
ありがとう。……あなたとまたゲームが出来るなら、……また六軒
島に来るのも、悪くないわ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Thanks. ...If I can play with you again... maybe coming back to Rokkenjima wouldn't be so bad.

tessie - TL: 待っておるぞ！　いつでも来るがよい！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I'll be waiting! Come whenever you like!

tessie - TL: 島の近くで船から落っこちれば、勝手に島に流れ着きますから。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: If you fell off of a boat closeby to the island, you'd drift here on your own anyway.

tessie - TL:
……菜央。貴女のカケラを覗いた時。……貴女がこれから巡るだろ
う数奇な運命を垣間見マシタ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...Nao, while I was peaking through your Fragments... I caught glimpse of a hapless fate to COME.

tessie - TL:
強く、生きて下サイ。貴女なら、どのようなカケラもつかみ取れる
はずデス。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Be strong, and please live ON. If it's you, you should be able to acquire any Fragment POSSIBLE.

tessie - TL:
あたしは、ただのお姉ちゃん大好きっ子だし。……運命なんて、な
るようになるわ。あたしは、恐れも期待もしない。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little:
I'm just a little girl who loves her sister. ...Whatever happens, happens. 
I don't have any fears or expectations.

tessie - TL:
……あ。
　ゆっくりと……、視界が暗くなっていくのを感じる。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...Ah. I can feel my vision... slowly darkening.

tessie - TL: 朝を迎え、あたしは起床するのだろう。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Morning will come, and I'll probably rise out of bed.

tessie - TL:
……楽しかったわ、六軒島。
　次に来る時は、……今度こそのんびり、刺繍をさせてね……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...It was fun, here at Rokkenjima. Next time I come... I'll definitely be able to relax and embroider...

tessie - TL:
……雀の囀りが聞こえて来た。
　ゆっくりと目を開けば、……朝日で満たされた温かな部屋の天井
が見えてくる……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little:
...I started to hear the sparrows chirping. If I slowly open my eyes...
I'll be able to see the ceiling of my room being warmed up by the morning sun......

tessie - TL: 今日で、六軒島ともお別れか……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Today, I'm parting ways with Rokkenjima, huh...?

tessie - TL:
そういえばベアトリーチェは、何かプレゼントがあると言ってな
かったっけ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Now that I've said that, I believe Beatrice told me she had a present for me.

tessie - TL: 楽しみにして目覚めるがよい、とか言っていたような………。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: "Do look forward to it upon waking up.", is what she told me, I think...

tessie - TL: こんな島、来なければよかった……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I should have never come to this island.
Lloro - QC/TL: こんな島、来なければよかった。
Naegles - QC2: I should have never come to this island.

tessie - TL: 嫌ああぁああぁあぁぁああぁぁぁあッ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Nooooooooooooooooo!!
Lloro - QC/TL: 嫌ああぁああぁあぁぁああぁぁぁあッ！！
Naegles - QC2: Nooooooooooooooooo!!

tessie - TL: 哀れな犠牲者たちは、……ベッドの上で、血まみれだった。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The poor victims... were on the bed covered in blood.
Lloro - QC/TL: 哀れな犠牲者たちは、……ベッドの上で、血まみれだった。
Naegles - QC2: The poor victims... were on the bed covered in blood.

tessie - TL:
魅音さんのネグリジェは、本当はとても可愛らしいものだったの
だろう。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Mion-san's negligee probably used to be very lovely.
Lloro - QC/TL:
彼女のネグリジェは、本当はとても可愛らしいものだったのだろ
う。
Naegles - QC2: The girl's negligee probably used to be very lovely.

tessie - TL:
しかし、刃物か何かで執拗に切りつけられて、ズタズタにされて
しまっている。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But... it had been relentlessly cut by a blade or something, and torn to shreds.
Lloro - QC/TL:
しかし、刃物か何かで執拗に切りつけられて、ズタズタにされて
しまっている。
Naegles - QC2: But... it had been relentlessly cut by a blade or something, and torn to shreds.

tessie - TL:
そこから溢れ出しただろう鮮血が、ネグリジェもシーツも、元が
何色だったか思い出せないほどに染めてしまっている。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The blood that must have poured out from that spot had dyed the negligee and the sheets to the point where I could no longer remember what color they were originally.
Lloro - QC/TL:
そこから溢れ出しただろう鮮血が、ネグリジェもシーツも、元が
何色だったか思い出せないほどに染めてしまっている。
Naegles - QC2: The blood that must have poured out from that spot had dyed the negligee and the sheets to the point where I could no longer remember what color they were originally.

tessie - TL:
詩音さんはガウン姿だった。……もちろん、真っ赤な鮮血に染め
られている。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Shion-san was in a gown. ...Of course, it was also stained with fresh, bright red blood.
Lloro - QC/TL:
もうひとりはガウン姿だった。……もちろん、真っ赤な鮮血に染
められている。
Naegles - QC2: The other one was in a gown. ...Of course, it was also stained with fresh, bright red blood.

tessie - TL:
こちらも同様に、ズタズタに切り裂かれ……、見るも無残な有様
だ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Just like Mion-san's, it had been torn to shreds... and was clearly in a pitiful state.
Lloro - QC/TL:
こちらも同様に、ズタズタに切り裂かれ……、見るも無残な有様
だ……。
Naegles - QC2: Just like the other one, it had been torn to shreds... and was clearly in a pitiful state.

tessie - TL:
３つのベッドの内、２つは鮮血に染まるが、１つは、昨晩から変
わらず清潔なままだ。
　それが、……あたしのベッド。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Out of three beds, two were covered in blood... But one bed was still as clean as it was last night. That was... my bed.
Lloro - QC/TL:
３つのベッドの内、２つは鮮血に染まるが、１つは、昨晩から変
わらず清潔なままだ。それが、……あたしのベッド。
Naegles - QC2: Out of three beds, two were covered in blood... But one bed was still as clean as it was last night. That was... my bed.

tessie - TL:
そしてあたしだけが、……血の一滴も浴びずに、彼女たちと同じ
部屋で、……熟睡していた……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: And I was the only one... who wasn't covered in a single drop of blood... while having slept soundly in the same room as them...
Lloro - QC/TL:
そしてあたしだけが、……血の一滴も浴びずに、彼女たちと同じ
部屋で、……熟睡していた……。
Naegles - QC2: And I was the only one... who wasn't covered in a single drop of blood... while having slept soundly in the same room as them...

tessie - TL:
だ、大丈夫ですか……。そう言おうと思った。
　しかし、あたしの口から出たのは、か細くて弱々しい、悲鳴と呼
ぶにも頼りない、かすれ声だけであった。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: "A-Are you okay...?", was what I wanted to say, but the only thing that came out of my mouth was a faint, unsteady groan that was too weak to be called a scream.
Lloro - QC/TL:
だ、大丈夫ですか……。そう言おうと思った。
　しかし、あたしの口から出たのは、か細くて弱々しい、悲鳴と呼
ぶにも頼りない、かすれ声だけであった。
Naegles - QC2: "A-Are you okay...?", was what I wanted to say, but the only thing that came out of my mouth was a faint, unsteady groan that was too weak to be called a scream.

tessie - TL:
あたしは部屋を飛び出し、隣室の扉を激しくノックしながら、同
時にドアノブも捻る。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I dashed out to the next room over, frantically knocking on the door while trying at the doorknob.
Lloro - QC/TL:
あたしは部屋を飛び出し、隣室の扉を激しくノックしながら、同
時にドアノブも捻る。
Naegles - QC2: I dashed out to the next room over, frantically knocking on the door while trying at the doorknob.

tessie - TL:
ヱリカさんッ、ヱリカさんッ！！　た、大変です大変です、たた、
助けて……ッ！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Erika-san, Erika-san!! S-Something awful happened! H-H-Help...!!
Lloro - QC/TL:
ヱリカさんッ、ヱリカさんッ！！　た、大変です大変です、たた、
助けて……ッ！！
Naegles - QC2: Erika-san, Erika-san!! S-Something awful happened! H-H-Help...!!

Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Huh...? It opened...?
Naegles - QC2: Huh...? It opened...?

tessie - TL:
ドアノブを捻ったって、鍵が掛けられているのだから、開く訳は
ない。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Even if you turn a doorknob, when it's locked, there's no way it would open.
Lloro - QC/TL:
ドアノブを捻ったって、鍵が掛けられているのだから、開く訳は
ない。
Naegles - QC2: Even if you turn a doorknob, there's no way it would open if the door was locked.

tessie - TL:
ドアノブをガチャガチャさせるのが、自分の混乱と状況の異常を
知らせる、無意識の方法だったからに過ぎない。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Rattling the doorknob like that was just my unconscious way of informing her of my confusion and the abnormality of the situation.
Lloro - QC/TL:
ドアノブをガチャガチャさせるのが、自分の混乱と状況の異常を
知らせる、無意識の方法だったからに過ぎない。
Naegles - QC2: Rattling the doorknob like that was just my unconscious way of informing her of my confusion and the abnormality of the situation.

tessie - TL:
……だから、扉が開いてしまうことは、まったく想定しなかった
のだ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...That's why I didn't actually expect the door to open.
Lloro - QC/TL:
……だから、扉が開いてしまうことは、まったく想定しなかった
のだ。
Naegles - QC2: ...That's why I didn't actually expect the door to open.

tessie - TL:
その異常が……、あたしの心を瞬時に凍らせ、……ナイフのよう
に鋭く尖らせる。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: It was so unexpected... that it made my heart stop for a second... sharpening my senses like a knife.
Lloro - QC/TL:
その異常が……、あたしの心を瞬時に凍らせ、……ナイフのよう
に鋭く尖らせる。
Naegles - QC2: It was so unexpected... that it made my heart stop for a second... sharpening my senses like a knife.

tessie - TL:
極限の恐怖は、感情の全てを殺し、五感を限界まで研ぎ澄ます。
　だが、所詮は氷のナイフ。
　……どんなに鋭くても、脆く、砕け散る……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Extreme fear can numb our emotions and sharpen our senses to the limit. But... it's a blade of ice in the end. ...No matter how sharp it is, it's fragile and easily shattered......
Lloro - QC/TL:
極限の恐怖は、感情の全てを殺し、五感を限界まで研ぎ澄ます。
　だが、所詮は氷のナイフ。
　……どんなに鋭くても、脆く、砕け散る……。
Naegles - QC2: Extreme fear can numb our emotions and sharpen our senses to the limit. But... it's a blade of ice in the end. ...No matter how sharp it is, it's fragile and easily shattered......

tessie - TL: ヱリカ……さん………？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Erika...san...?
Lloro - QC/TL: ヱリカ……さん………？
Naegles - QC2: Erika...san...?

tessie - TL:
染められていた……。
　ヱリカさんもまた、ベッドの上で……、真っ赤に、血まみれ
に………。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: It was stained... Erika-san was also on the bed... red and bloody......
Lloro - QC/TL:
染められていた……。
　ヱリカさんもまた、ベッドの上で……、真っ赤に、血まみれ
に………。
Naegles - QC2: It was stained... Erika-san was also on the bed... red and bloody......

tessie - TL: 嫌あああぁあぁぁあぁあぁあぁぁぁぁぁッ！！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!!!!!!!!!!!
Lloro - QC/TL: 嫌あああぁあぁぁあぁあぁあぁぁぁぁぁッ！！！
Naegles - QC2: Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!!!!!!!!!!!

tessie - TL: …………ヱリカさん。おはようございます。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ......Erika-san, good morning.

tessie - TL: 当然、死体が喋ることはない。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Of course, corpses don't speak.

tessie - TL: なら、死体が呼吸をする必要もないわね。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: So, corpses don't need to breathe either.

tessie - TL: ゲハッ！！　こッ、殺す気ですか、ハアハア、ゼエゼエ！！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Guh--!!! A-Are you trying to kill me?! Haah, haah, *cough*cough*!!!

tessie - TL: おはようございます、ヱリカさん。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Good morning, Erika-san.

tessie - TL:
これもきっと、ワニャンの映画の中のワンシーンの再現なんですよ
ね？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: This is another reenactment of a scene you saw in the Wanyan movie, isn't it?

tessie - TL:
ふっふっふ！　完璧だったでしょう？！　特に、死に顔にほのかに
残る未練と慕情の再現は、究極的だったと思いますッ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: *giggle*giggle*giggle*! Wasn't it perfect?! I thought my death face in particular was the ultimate expression of one's leftover traces of regret and yearning!!

tessie - TL:
ただ、名探偵ワニャンへの愛があるだけで、古戸ヱリカにはこの程
度のコスプレが可能です！　如何ですか、魅音さん詩音さんッ？！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Just through my love for Detective Wanyan, this level of cosplay is possible for Erika Furudo! What do you think, Mion-san and Shion-san?!

tessie - TL:
……向こうも死体だわ。あなたとどちらが完璧か、採点をお願いす
るわ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...There are dead bodies over there too. I wish there were grades on these to see who did it better...

tessie - TL:
ヱリカさんは、ズタズタの血塗れゾンビの姿で、不敵に笑いなが
ら、あたしたちの部屋に飛び込んでいく。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: With an intrepid laugh, Erika-san burst into our room looking like a zombie out of a horror movie.

tessie - TL:
おおッ！！！　……なかなかの再現度です！　これは確か劇場版
の……３２分１８秒の……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Oooohhh!!! ...What a splendid recreation! This must be... if I'm correct... the movie scene at 32 minutes and 18 seconds......

tessie - TL:
これ……映画館で隠し撮りしたの……？　それ犯罪よ。映画泥棒
よ。頭からポップコーンぶちまけるわよ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Is this... did you guys sneak a picture at the theaters...? That's a crime. Movie thieves. Popcorn is gonna shoot out of your heads now.

tessie - TL:
ヱリカさんがどこからともなく取り出した、秘密探偵道具の小さ
な画面には、……この部屋の惨状とそっくりなシーンが映し出され
ていた……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: From who knows where, Erika-san grabbed out a secret detective gadget with a little screen... which depicted a scene that matched perfectly with what was in this room...

tessie - TL:
まず、詩音さんから！　強打者（スラッガ）くんの再現、お見事で
す！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Firstly, Shion-san, powerful portrayal of {note_green}Slugger-kun{/note_green}!

tessie - TL:
いいですね、衣装が完璧なのは当然として、この感じ！　心から
キャラになり切らないとなかなか出来ません！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Yeah, that's it, the clothes being perfectly in the right form, just like that! This couldn't be done unless you allowed the character to envelop your soul!

tessie - TL:
一番大事なのはこの儚い死に顔！！　実にいい表情ですッ！　これ
は満点を出しましょう！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But what ties it all together is that reactionary death face!! Truly an amazing facial expression! Just let me give you an A+!

tessie - TL:
ヒョオウ！　さっすがワニャラー！！　細かいところまでよく見て
下さりましたね！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Haaaah! That's a Wanyanner if I see one!! You judged it down to every last detail, huh?!
Lloro - QC/TL: idk if hyoou is a reference pls help

tessie - TL: すごいわ。……惨殺死体が上機嫌に跳ね起きたわ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Incredible. ...She just sprang up from out of her death position like it was nothing...

tessie - TL:
続きまして魅音さんですね。こちらは町留田（マチルダ）さんの再
現、これもまたお見事です！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Now I'll judge Mion-san. This one is a depiction of {note_green}Matilda-san{/note_green}; very nicely done as well!

tessie - TL:
もはや、言うまでもなく完璧なのですが、……ダブルパーフェクト
が出るかどうかは、ここに掛かってます！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I had already called the other one perfect... but this one really has me feeling like this is a <double perfect!!>
Lloro - QC/TL: feeling usage? i was thinking of saying "lines up with the other" etc

tessie - TL: 菜央さん、わかりますぅ？　この細かいこだわり。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Nao-san, do you get why she's so hung up on the details?

tessie - TL: ……だから全然わかりません。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ......Yeah, not at all.

tessie - TL:
このネグリジェの裾！　ほら、少しだけ膨らんでいるでしょう？　
ここ！　指輪ケースが隠れてるんです！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The bottom edge of this negligee! See how it puffs out a little bit? Right here! There's a ring case hidden here!

tessie - TL:
どうせ見えない部分だからと、適当に誤魔化しちゃうレイヤーさん
も多いんですが、……さてさて魅音さんは……ッ？！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Since you can't see it at all, lots of cosplayers might lazily gloss over that fact... but with Mion-san...?!

tessie - TL:
ありましたぁ！！　しかもすごい原作再現度！！　投げ返された時
についた傷跡まで完璧！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: She has iiiit!! Absolutely artful remastering of the original work!! It's perfect, even down to the scar she got from when she was thrown back!!

tessie - TL: ……もう全然意味がわかりません。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...I just don't know what's happening anymore.

tessie - TL:
くっくっく！　細部にこそ神は宿る、見えないところにまでこだ
わってこそ真のワニャラー！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: *cackle*cackle*cackle*! God is in the details! Being fastidious even over aspects that go unseen is to be a true Wanyanner!
Lloro - QC/TL: reworded the first part bc i feel like it would be offensive in english

tessie - TL: ……ホントごめんなさい。帰ったら必ず映画館いきます。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...I'm so sorry. Once I get back I'll absolutely go to the movie theaters.

tessie - TL:
ヱリカさんの衣装を見る限り、どうやら、未来（ミライ）さんの死
亡現場を再現してたみたいですね！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Even looking at Erika-san's clothes, I can somehow tell she recreated {note_green}Mirai-san's{/note_green} death scene!

tessie - TL:
ちょっとヱリカさんの部屋に戻ろうよ！　ヱリカさん、見るからも
う１回死んで死んで！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Let's go check out Erika-san's room! Erika-san, we wanna see, so just die one more time, one more time!!

tessie - TL: ……ホント皆さん、１回死んで下さい……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...Really, everyone, just die once......

tessie - TL: このワニャラーどもは、すっごく和気藹々と楽しんでいる。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: These Wanyanners are having a blast because they're so incredibly compatible.

tessie - TL:
昨日、何だかギスギスした言葉を交わし合っていた気がするけ
ど、あれもきっと、ワニャンに出てくる劇中の掛け合いの真似なの
だろう。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I feel like some pretty edgy words were being exchanged yesterday, but that was also likely... another Wanyan recital they started doing.

tessie - TL:
魅音さんと詩音さん、そしてヱリカさんは、共通の趣味を持つ者
として、かなり早い段階から意気投合していたのだ……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Mion-san, Shion-san, and Erika-san all have common interests, so they were able to get onstage together and hit it off fast...

tessie - TL:
それで、劇中の洋館ミステリーっぽい、ギスギスとした会話を交
わし合い、わかる人にしかわからない会話を楽しんでいた………？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: So with that, they engaged in an edgy Western mystery roleplay conversation that only people who were in the know could enjoy...?

tessie - TL: ストップ。……すると、とても当然な疑問に行きつくわ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Stop. ...Thereupon, we arrive at a very obvious question.

tessie - TL: 疑問？　何でしょうか？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: A question? And what could that be?

tessie - TL:
あー、映画を楽しむには、やはり漫画を読了してないとダメか、っ
てことでしょうか。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Ah-, maybe enjoying the movie is actually impossible without finishing the manga first, is that what you mean?

tessie - TL:
さすがに全巻読了は厳しいからね！　６８巻以降でいいんじゃない
かな。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Finishing the whole series is as brutal as one would expect! Shouldn't she start off on volume 68?
Lloro - QC/TL: from "as brutal as I thought"

tessie - TL:
ぴぴぴー！　ダメですダメです！　ワニャンを取り巻く人間関係の
深みを知らなければ、面白さは激減です！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Eeeeeee~! Never that, never that! Without knowing the depth surrounding the character relationships in the Wanyan universe, the entertainment level would dramatically decrease!

tessie - TL:
ですよねー！　やっぱり菜央さんには全巻を読んでいただかない
と！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Riiight?! Nao-san definitely needs to read through the entire thing!

tessie - TL: いい加減にして下さい。切り刻みますよ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Please cut that out. I'm gonna chop you guys up.

tessie - TL: ワニャラーどもは、ヒッと短い悲鳴をあげて、正座した……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The Wanyanners were taken aback, shrieking with a little "Hee?!"

tessie - TL: 今から、皆さんに質問します。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I will now set up an inquiry for everyone.

tessie - TL:
返答如何では、ホントに殺人事件になりますので、心してお返事下
さい。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Depending on your answer, it will literally become a murder case, so please reply with caution.

tessie - TL:
な、何よぉ～……、凄んじゃって、菜央ちゃんの可愛い顔が台無し
だよぉ。ねぇ？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Wha-whaaat~...? If you're gonna threaten me, Nao-chan, don't ruin it with having such a cuuuute little face. Okay?

tessie - TL: 教えてくれても、よかったじゃないですか。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I'm glad that you taught me that, you know?

tessie - TL: 教えてって、何を……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Taught you... what...?

tessie - TL:
あたしのベッドに魔法陣が現れた時！　教えてくれればよかった
じゃないですかッ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: When that magic circle appeared on my bed, I'm really glad that you taught me that, you know?!

tessie - TL:
これは名探偵ワニャンの映画に出てくるワンシーンで云々！　教え
てくれれば、あたしは怯えずに済んだんですッ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: This was an actual scene from the Wanyan movie! In teaching me that, it stopped being scary to me.

tessie - TL: それはぁ……、ねぇ………？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: That's... yeah...?

tessie - TL:
菜央ちゃんの驚きようが……、あんまりに可愛かったもので……つ
いつい……。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Nao-chan getting surprised was... excessively cute... though unintentional...

tessie - TL:
ハイ、……“あんまりに可愛かったもので、ついつい”。１７文字
ですね。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: {i}Yeah{/i}... "Excessively cute, though unintentional.". 34 letters, right?
Lloro - QC/TL: IF SOMEONE DOES CHANGE THE ONE ABOVE PLEASE KEEP THE AMOUNT OF LETTERS IN QUOTES AS 34 PLEASE PLEASE

tessie - TL: 魅音さんと詩音さんは１７分割に切り刻みます。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I'm going to chop you and Shion-san into 34 bits.
Lloro - QC/TL: PLEASEE ITS PERTINENT TO THE STORY
Naegles - QC2: ok but the fact the bits they would be cut into would amount to 34... lets discuss

tessie - TL:
続きまして、ヱリカさん。……あなたは本当は、見ていたんですよ
ね？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Let's continue, Erika-san. ...Did you really see it?
Lloro - QC/TL: watch -> see

tessie - TL: え？　何を？　ワニャンの放送はもちろん全部……、
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Eh? See what? Of course I saw all of Wanyan's broadcast....
Lloro - QC/TL: added see

tessie - TL:
あなたの部屋の魔法陣です！　詩音さんの悪戯はお昼前にはもう行
われていたわ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: The magic circle in your room! Shion-san's prank had already been done before noon!

tessie - TL:
あなたは施錠前に室内を確認したけれど、異常はなかったと言いま
した。……嘘ですよね？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: You checked inside before you locked your room, but you said you found nothing out of the ordinary. ...That was a lie, wasn't it?

tessie - TL:
……紗音さんが魔法陣を気にしなかった件で混乱しているようだっ
たので、ちょっとからかっちゃおうと思いまして……♪
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...You were so confused over the case with Shannon-san not batting an eye at the magic circle prank that I thought I'd maybe mess around with you for a little bit...♪

tessie - TL:
“紗音さんが魔法陣………っちゃおうと思いまして”……。４９文
字ですね。サービスで切り上げて５０文字です。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Hm, so your statement in total had 49 vowels... right? I'll do you a favor and make it 50.
Lloro - QC/TL: IM PUKIGN

tessie - TL:
さすがに５０分割は面倒臭いので、ヱリカさんはフードプロセッ
サーに放り込んだ方が楽そうです。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: 50 pieces would definitely be painstaking to get to, though, so tossing Erika-san in a food processor would be much more fun.
Lloro - QC/TL: LIKE ITS SO GENIUS

tessie - TL: ひーーッ、猟奇的ぃ！！　３人は悲鳴を上げる。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: "Eeeekkk, how grotesque!!" The three shrieked.

tessie - TL:
あたしから見れば、あんな惨殺体の格好をして互いに写真を撮り
合うアンタらの方が、ずっと猟奇的だ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: No, from my point of view, the image of three massacred bodies banding together in front of me has been {i}far more{/i} grotesque.

tessie - TL:
まぁ、３人とも素直に謝りましたので、切り刻むのは今回は保留し
ます。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Well, since you three already apologized earnestly, I'll save mincing you up for another day.

tessie - TL:
はーーッ。よかったぁ！　菜央ちゃんも、ワニャンを見てたらいい
よ！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Haaaahh. Thank goodnesss! Nao-chan, if you watched Wanyan too it would be awesome!

tessie - TL: ぜーったい、映画見たら、ワニャン沼にズブズブ入りますからぁ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: If you see the movie, you'll AB-SO-lutely sink deep into the Wanyan swamp.

tessie - TL:
ワニャン沼、いいですねぇ。今度、コラボカフェがあるそうです
よぉ！　一緒に行きましょおー！！
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Wanyan swamp, oh, I like that. There's apparently a cafe collabing with them that opened recently! Let's go togetheeerrrr!!

tessie - TL: ……今、最後の謎が浮かんだわ。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: ...The last mystery has just emerged.

tessie - TL:
あなたたちがそれぞれ、熱狂的な名探偵ワニャンのファンであるこ
とは理解しました。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: I've finally grasped that each of you are wildly enthusiastic about Detective Wanyan.

tessie - TL:
しかしそれにしたって……、あなたたちの意気投合っぷりは、
ちょっと考え難いほどです。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But with that said... it's a bit hard to understand why you guys are so chummy.

tessie - TL: あなたたちは、いつの間にそんなに仲良くなっていたんですか？
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: At what point did you guys start getting along so well?

tessie - TL:
あぁ……、いよいよ明かされる。
　あたしにとっての六軒島は、魔女と魔法陣と謎解きのミステリア
スな２泊３日だった。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: Aah... it's getting more and more clear. For me, my stay on Rokkenjima has been a very mysterious three days and two nights, involving witches, magic circles, and puzzles to solve.

tessie - TL: しかし。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: But...

tessie - TL:
あたしが魔法陣に怯え、不可解な謎に頭を悩ませている間
に……、彼女たちは、#pと#s・#r#pて#s・#r#pつ#s・#r#pも#s・#r#pな#s・#r#pい#s・#r暗闘を繰り広げていたの
だ………。
Uminetta - TL (I translated it a little: As I was fearing magic circles and being concerned with baffling mysteries... a {i}preposterous secret feud{/i} between the girls began to ensue.
